scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../cli && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.desktop: concurrently -n "BACKEND,ELECTRON" -c "blue,magenta" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run electron:dev --prefix frontend"
